_comment: LEVEL Pipeline Configuration - All values from configuration.json and pro Indian trading standards
_description: Bounce/rejection at key price levels (support, resistance, VWAP, premium/discount zones)

time_windows._comment: From configuration.json time_policy - NSE trading hours with opening bell for ICT setups

quality._comment: ALIGNED TO BASELINE: min_t1_rr: 1.2 from configuration.json

gates._comment: From configuration.json - min_volume_mult: 1.5 for support_bounce, order_block

trend_up._comment: REVERTED: counter_trend_size_mult 0.5→0.7 as 0.5 killed resistance_bounce_short (+2,569 Rs)

trend_down._comment: REVERTED: counter_trend_size_mult 0.5→0.7 to restore profitable level setups

level_touch._comment: RELAXED for more data: was 2 touches, now 1 touch

setup_regime_blocks._comment: Data-driven filters from backtest analysis - block unprofitable setup+regime combinations

range_bounce_long._evidence: RELAXED: was blocking chop. Original: 62 trades in chop, -4,048 PnL, 45.2% win rate (vs +565 in trend_up)

discount_zone_long._evidence: Dec 2024 analysis: 1 trade, -500 Rs, 0% WR - block entirely

vwap_lose_short._evidence: Dec 2024 analysis: 16 trades, -3,282 Rs, 25% WR. 0% WR in trend_up, 27% in chop. Winners have ADX 37.5 vs losers 27.2

resistance_bounce_short._comment: DATA-DRIVEN Dec 2024: Block losing regime, need indicator-based analysis for hard_sl reduction
resistance_bounce_short._performance: trend_down: +8,305 Rs (66.7% WR), trend_up: -882 Rs (block), 24 hard_sl trades cost -12,322 Rs

range_bounce_short._evidence: 6-month analysis: 51.7% hard_sl rate in chop, 15 trades = -8,710 Rs. Net +1,951 if blocked.

global_short_adx_filter._comment: Dec 2024 analysis: Block all short trades when ADX < 18
global_short_adx_filter._evidence: ADX < 15 = 0% WR (-1,112 Rs). ADX 20-25 = 62% WR (+11,577 Rs). Min 18 catches weak trends.

vwap_volume._comment: RELAXED: 50k->25k for more data. Original: VWAP vol<50k: 18 trades (6W, 12L)
vwap_volume._evidence: RELAXED for more data. Original: Low volume VWAP trades have poor execution and high slippage

validated_filters._comment: CROSS-RUN VALIDATED FILTERS (Dec 2024) - Consistent across backtest_20251204 and backtest_20251205

resistance_bounce_short_adx._evidence: R1: +3,671 Rs (14 trades) | R2: +2,692 Rs (15 trades) - ADX<20 = no trend, bounce fails

resistance_bounce_short_bb_width._evidence: Dec 2024 analysis: bb_width<=0.10 reduces hard_sl from 35%→28%, 46 trades 54% WR Rs 6,465 PnL

support_bounce_long_adx._evidence: RELAXED for more data: was 20, now 10. Original: R1: +1,819 Rs (8 trades) | R2: +1,819 Rs (8 trades)

premium_zone_short_adx._evidence: R1: +1,244 Rs (5 trades) | R2: +1,244 Rs (5 trades) - Very low ADX = no directional movement

support_bounce_long_srr._evidence: RELAXED for more data: was 3.0, now 10.0. Original: R1: +826 Rs (36 trades)

long_trade_volume._evidence: RELAXED for more data: was 150k, now 50k. Original: Winners have 2x volume (213k vs 107k)

range_bounce_short_chop_adx._evidence: Dec 2024: In chop regime, ADX>=20: 10 trades Rs +4,575 (73% WR) vs ADX<20: 19 trades Rs -800. Block low ADX.

vwap_lose_short_trend_up._evidence: Dec 2024: ALL 4 trend_up trades hit hard_sl (Rs -2,179). Shorting in uptrend = guaranteed loss.

premium_zone_short_trend_down_adx._evidence: Dec 2024: In trend_down, ADX>=32: 31 trades Rs +4,884 (9 HSL) vs ADX<32: 26 trades Rs -1,865 (16 HSL). Strong trends work.

range_bounce_short_adx._evidence: 6-month backtest Dec 2024: ADX>=30: 79 trades, 35% WR, Rs -9,121 | ADX<30: 119 trades, 53% WR, Rs +26,700

range_bounce_short_rr._evidence: 6-month backtest Dec 2024: R:R 2-4: 48 trades, 73% WR, Rs +26,512 | R:R<2: 39% WR | R:R>=4: 33% WR

resistance_bounce_short_max_adx._evidence: 6-month backtest Dec 2024: ADX<30: 149 trades, 53.7% WR, Rs +26,410 | ADX>=30: 133 trades, 48.1% WR, Rs +286

resistance_bounce_short_rr._evidence: 6-month backtest Dec 2024: R:R 1.5-3: 69 trades, 66.7% WR, Rs +24,945 | R:R<1.5: 40.5% WR | R:R>=3: 42.1% WR

long_specific_filters._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Filters specific to long trades based on winner/loser analysis

rsi_max._evidence: RSI>=70: 9.3% WR (7W/75T). RSI<60: 16.4% WR (32W/195T). High RSI = chasing exhausted moves.

squeeze_regime_boost._evidence: 55.6% of winning longs came from squeeze regime vs only 20% from trend_up.

max_hold_minutes._evidence: Pro traders hold 30-90 min max. After 2 hours, momentum fades. Time-based exit if no T1 hit.

ranking._comment: ALL values from OLD filters.json rank_* settings to match baseline ranker.py _intraday_strength()

adx._comment: ISSUE 3 FIX: Added cap=0.4 to prevent high ADX from dominating score (losers had 0.615 vs winners 0.475)

strategy_regime_multipliers._comment: From baseline ranker.py _get_regime_multiplier() - Strategy-specific overrides for LEVEL setups

vwap_reclaim._comment: VWAP strategies similar to mean reversion - chop boost

premium_zone._comment: From baseline: chop=1.3, trend=0.9 - premium/discount zones work best in ranging

discount_zone._comment: From baseline: chop=1.3, trend=0.9 - premium/discount zones work best in ranging

order_block._comment: From baseline: trend=1.2, chop=1.1 - order blocks work in all conditions

entry._comment: WIDENED (Dec 2024): zone_mult_atr 0.3->0.5, min_zone_pct 0.25->0.30. Zero-trigger setups had 0.10-0.20% zones.

targets._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Long avg MFE=0.74R, only 15% hit 1.5R but 28% hit 1.0R. Lower T1 for longs.

long._comment: LOWERED: T1 1.5R→1.0R for longs. support_bounce_long has only 5% T1 hit rate at 1.5R.

short._comment: Shorts keep 1.5R T1 - they have 1.13R avg MFE vs 0.74R for longs

qty_splits._comment: 60-40 split to match OLD config - T3 disabled (0%)

caps._comment: FIXED: max_pct was 1.0 (1%) - way too restrictive! Old config uses 100%. Targets need to reach 2-3R for positive expectancy.

rsi_penalty._comment: LEVEL: Penalize extreme RSI (price may overshoot level)
